mapper.select: SELECT ss.* FROM sys.sys_user su left JOIN sys.sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id left join sys.sys_role_system srs on sur.role_id = srs.role_id left join sys.sys_system ss on srs.system_id = ss.id where su.id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ss.id is not null GROUP BY ss.id ORDER BY ss.create_date
